titleStmt.title: Dictionary, Tamil-French, by Bourzès, part 2 of 2

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: A Tamil-French dictionary by Louis Natal de Bourzès (L de Bourges, according to the title on the spine).
Second part: from tā to kṣo (tākam to kṣōpalam).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (October 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark on recto.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Shelfmark on recto. Verso blank.
2 folios = front guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
263 folios = Tamil-French Dictionary. Arabic pagination 1-537. Library Arabic foliation 1-263. f262v, f263rv blank.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc: Sticker with shelfmark (in black ink): A.a/7 (spine).

Title printed on the spine:
L. DE BOURGES
DICTIONNAIRE
TAMOUL ET FRANÇAIS
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 214 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 214 (f[1]r).

binding.p: Leather (brown) covers. Shelfmarks and title on the spine.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to the 18th century by Cabaton (1912) and James (2000), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 35.
Gros, François. 1980. [Review of] A. Dhamotharan : Tamil Dictionaries. A Bibliography. In: Bulletin de l’École française d’Extrême-Orient 67: 346-358. — See p. 353.
James, Gregory. 2000. Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A. — See p. 115, 695 [TBC].
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 51r, no. 205-206 213-214 212-213.

Vinson, Julien. 1899. Notice sur quelques missionnaires jésuites qui ont écrit en tamoul et sur le tamoul au dernier siècle. In: Revue de linguistique et de philologie comparée 31: 141-146. — See p. 103.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
